output_list.description: The vulnerability exists in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`. It allows an attacker to create an arbitrary amount of tokens and transfer them to any user, including the owner. The attacker can also set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Relies on outdated constructor naming conventions prone to typos.
Predictable winner selection without secure randomness enables exploitation.
The attacker can also set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
